Sources: NIST SP 800-61r2 (https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-61r2.pdf); MITRE ATT&CK (https://attack.mitre.org/); OASIS STIX 2.1 (https://docs.oasis-open.org/cti/stix/v2.1/os/stix-v2.1-os.html). **Learning Objectives:** [Insert the 6 objectives from above]. **Scaffolding Layers:** [Insert the 4 layers from above]. **Active Learning:** Incorporate scenarios/discussions into APPLY/ANALYZE/EVALUATE/CREATE cards (e.g., ransomware, SolarWinds). **Concept Map:** Playbook Execution → IR Lifecycle (NIST phases) | Automation (Manual/Semi/Full SOAR) | Dependencies (Monitoring Tools) → Outcomes (Mitigation/Reporting).
